projects.title: Event Calendar
projects.description: Full stack Event Calendar application built using React for the client, alogside Express and MongoDB for the API. Users can add, remove and edit events(sorted by organization) to a persistent database.*Actively under development*

projects.title: Audbren Elevating Landing Site
projects.description: Demo Landing site for Audbren Elevating built using Gatsby. Currently has placeholder text and some stock images as content is still under review. Incorporates Google Maps to show business locations.

projects.title: SendGrid Events Tracking
projects.description: Pull mailing events from SendGrid using either a webhook or timed api calls. These events are then stored to a specified blob storage account for use in PowerBI reporting.

projects.title: Data Factory Large File Extraction
projects.description: Data Factory pipeline step (custom Azure Function) that handles extraction of very large zip files. Files can be uploaded to a specified blob container and will be extracted to the same or different location in blob storage.
